hotels.title: Elegant Coventry City Break near Medieval Cathedral
hotels.description: Experience the rich history and vibrant culture of Coventry with a stay at the luxurious Hotel Indigo Coventry, an IHG Hotel. This elegant hotel is a stone's throw from the city's iconic landmarks, including the Coventry Cathedral. Immerse yourself in the local scene by exploring Fargo Village, a creative hub filled with independent shops and eateries. At the end of the day, retreat to Cogs Restaurant and Bar for a signature cocktail, or indulge in a gourmet meal.
